title: Cumberland sausage, chicken and squash traybake
description: Serve this with a big pile of wintery greens, such as Savoy cabbage. Optional chilli flakes will counter the maple sweetness.
ingredients: 4 chicken thighs, skin on, bone in
500g/1lb 2oz pumpkin or squash, cut into wedges
few sprigs thyme, or 1 tsp dried thyme
salt and freshly ground black pepper
